article_title: Grateful Dead’s Phil Lesh Reveals He Has Bladder Cancer
article_text:
SAN RAFAEL, Calif.—Grateful Dead bassist Phil Lesh says he has been diagnosed with bladder cancer and is being treated in Arizona.

The 75-year-old bassist announced his illness Friday on the Facebook page of his San Rafael restaurant and concert hall, Terrapin Crossroads.

Mr. Lesh says he was diagnosed in early October and has been...

twitter.description: Grateful Dead bassist Phil Lesh, 75, says he has been diagnosed with bladder cancer and is being treated in Arizona. Mr. Lesh says pathology reports show his tumors are non-aggressive.
twitter.title: Grateful Dead’s Phil Lesh Reveals He Has Bladder Cancer
